definition: Stanford (University)/also written 斯坦福[Si1 tan3 fu2]

sentences.english: Denver international airport currently has the most runways in the world with six.
sentences.chinese: 目前丹佛国际机场拥有6条跑道，是世界上最多的。

sentences.english: And so my family moved to a tiny town high up in the mountains outside Denver.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我们举家迁往丹佛市外深山高岭中的一座小镇。

sentences.english: Is the five-thirty flight from Denver on time?
Come mix & mingle with Denver’s top IE6 mourners.
sentences.chinese: 来和丹佛的IE6悼念者们聚会下吧。

sentences.english: I am applying for admission to Stanford University.
sentences.chinese: 我正在申请史丹佛大学的入学许可。

sentences.english: I am from the U. S. I live in Denver, Colorado.
sentences.chinese: 我来自美国，现在我住在科罗拉多州的丹佛市。
只有一只叫丹佛的小公狗。
史丹佛，他可是个内衣模特。

sentences.english: I returned to Denver and turned off my TV for a month.
sentences.chinese: 我回到丹佛后，电视关了一个月。

sentences.english: Stanford and Berkley will experience a huge shift towards righteousness in their student bodies.
sentences.chinese: 在史丹佛和柏克莱的学生中将经历公义的大翻转。

sentences.english: Romi is one of the 34 members of the Denver Broncos cheerleader team.
sentences.chinese: 露美是丹佛野马拉拉队的34名成员之一。

sentences.english: Praise God that Mrs. Wu and professor Chang have safely returned to Denver.
sentences.chinese: 感谢神保守，吴妈妈与张教授已平安回到丹佛。

sentences.english: And parents in the Denver area seem to support it.
sentences.chinese: 丹佛地区的父母似乎也乐意于此。

sentences.english: They gave me the best opportunity I could hope for by sending me to Denver.
sentences.chinese: 把握送到丹佛，他们给了我我能祈望的最好的机会。

sentences.english: The other wild card here, as always, is Denver.
sentences.chinese: 另个一变数，正是那个常年抽风的丹佛掘金。

sentences.english: How did you get on with old Danvers?
sentences.chinese: 你和丹佛斯这老婆子相处得怎样？

definition: Salt Lake City, capital of Utah
Philadelphia, Pennsylvania/abbr. for 費拉德爾菲亞|费拉德尔菲亚[Fei4 la1 de2 er3 fei1 ya4]
